title: Direction of electric field due to two charges

content.description: Charges -Q and +Q are located on the x- and y-axes, respectively, each at a distance d from the origin O, as shown above.
content.question: What is the direction of the electric field at the origin O ?

choices.label: Choice A is anhorizontalarrow pointing to the right.
Choice B is anhorizontal arrow pointing to the left.
Choice C is andiagonal arrow pointing up and to the left.
Choice D is andiagonal arrow pointing down and to the right.
Choice E is andiagonal arrow pointing down and to the left.

content.answer: Choice D is andiagonal arrow pointing down and to the right.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
